Uses of Interface
org.swixml.Converter

Packages that use Converter

Uses of Converter in org.swixml
 

Methods in org.swixml that return Converter
 Converter ConverterLibrary.getConverter(Class template)
          Returns a Converter instance, able to produce objects of the given class
 

Methods in org.swixml with parameters of type Converter
 void ConverterLibrary.register(Class template, Converter converter)
          Registers a Converter with the ConverterLibrary
 void ConverterLibrary.register(Converter converter)
          Registers a Converter with the ConverterLibrary
 

Uses of Converter in org.swixml.converters
 

Classes in org.swixml.converters that implement Converter
 class ActionConverter
          The ActionConverter is a tagging class that is only used to regsiter the Action.class with the ConverterLibrary
 class BorderConverter
          The BorderConverter class defines a converter that creates Border objects based on a provided String.
 class ColorConverter
          The ColorConverter class defines a Converter that turns the Strings into a Color object
 class ComponentConverter
          The ComponentConverter class defines a dummy converter It's simply here to allow the registration of setter-methods excepting Components
 class DimensionConverter
          A Converter that turns a Strings in the form: width,height into Dimension objects.
 class FontConverter
          The FontConverter class defines / describes
 class ImageConverter
          A Converter that turns a Strings in the form of a filename into an Image objects.
 class ImageIconConverter
          A Converter that turns a Strings in the form of a filename into an ImageIcon objects.
 class InsetsConverter
          The InsetsConverter class defines a converter that creates Insets objects based on a provided String.
 class KeyStrokeConverter
          A Converter that turns a Strings in the form of a filename into an KeyStroke objects.
 class LocaleConverter
          The LocaleConverter class defines / describes
 class PointConverter
          A Converter that turns a Strings into Point objects
 class PrimitiveConverter
          The PrimitiveConverter class defines a converter that creates primitive objects (wrapper), based on a provided input Class and String.
 class RectangleConverter
          A Converter that turns a Strings in the form: width,height into Rectangle objects.
 class StringConverter
          The StringConverter class defines / describes
